// These are base actors for monsters, miscellaneous characters,
// and other actors that require them for one reason or another.

// Monster bases
// The monsters are split into 8 possible types with 5 sizes, or 40 total bases,
// with extra bases as well

// Humanoid enemies
// Zombiemen, Nitrogoloms, Acolytes, etc.

// Tiny size
Actor SamsaraMonsterHumanoidTiny
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("Totenkopf_BurningGuard")
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop			
		Death.RottFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BurningSkeleton")
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking		
			TNT1 A 5
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop	
		Death.WolfenFlamethrower:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.RottExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
	    XDeath321:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RottGibbedMan",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 1
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LudicrousGibsItem", 1)
			TNT1 AA 0
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SOLID,0)		
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("RGodModeDeath")
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop
		Disintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTGIB",1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOORCLIP",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("DisintEffectTiny",0,10)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop
		Death.Nuke:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID", 0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream

			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("WTNukeDeathTiny")

			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait		
		Death.UnrealDamage:
		Death.UnrealPlasma:
		Death.UnrealSludge:
		Death.ASMDShockTrace:
		Death.UnrealExplosive:
		Death.UnrealRazor:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-20, "UnrealXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.UnrealExtreme:
		Death.UnrealRedeemer:
		Death.UnrealShredded:
		UnrealXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("UnrealGenericGibSpawnerM", 0,0,0,0,0,0,0, SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION | SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR| SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
		Death.RTCWExplosive:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")
			Goto RTCWXDeath
		Death.RTCWVenomBullet:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")

			//"####" "#" 5
			//"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RTCW_DeathGibberKeep",1,1)
			//Goto Death
			//"####" "#" 5
			//Goto Death		
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		RTCWXDeath:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
		RTCWXDeath2:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")

			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RTCW_GibSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop

		Death.Q3Energy:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-20,"XDeath.Q3Explosive")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait

		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait		
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "XDeath")
			Wait
	}

// Small size
Actor SamsaraMonsterHumanoidSmall
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:

			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait		
		Death.UnrealDamage:
		Death.UnrealPlasma:
		Death.UnrealSludge:
		Death.ASMDShockTrace:
		Death.UnrealExplosive:
		Death.UnrealRazor:

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait

		Death.UnrealRedeemer:
		Death.UnrealShredded:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)

			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)

		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "XDeath")
			Wait
	}

// Medium size
Actor SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("Totenkopf_BurningGuard")
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop			
		Death.RottFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BurningSkeleton")

			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait		
		Death.UnrealDamage:
		Death.UnrealPlasma:
		Death.UnrealSludge:
		Death.ASMDShockTrace:
		Death.UnrealExplosive:
		Death.UnrealRazor:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-20, "UnrealXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.UnrealExtreme:
		Death.UnrealRedeemer:
		Death.UnrealShredded:
		UnrealXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("UnrealGenericGibSpawnerM", 0,0,0,0,0,0,0, SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION | SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR| SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop

			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")

		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "XDeath")
			Wait
	}

// Large size
Actor SamsaraMonsterHumanoidLarge
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("Totenkopf_BurningGuard")
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop			
		Death.RottFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItem("BurningSkeleton")
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking		
			TNT1 A 5
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop	
		Death.WolfenFlamethrower:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")

// Huge size (reserve these for bosses)
Actor SamsaraMonsterHumanoidHuge
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.15
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "CorvusHellstaffTomed", 0.2

	PainChance "PhosFireCoop", 0 	
	PainChance "EradCoopGreenFire", 0
	PainChance "EradGreenFire", 0
	PainChance "StrifeExplosive", 0
	PainChance "PSFire", 5	
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 96
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 96
	PainChance "ShrinkerDMG", 0
	PainChance "PainkillerIce", 0
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID", 0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking	
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOORCLIP",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("RGodModeDeathHuge")
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)

// Demonic enemies //
// Most of the Doom roster, some Shadow Warrior ReMixer enemies, etc.

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)

		Death.PSRAPower:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 5
			Stop	
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)

			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")

			wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait

		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

// Small size

{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5

	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255

    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{

			Stop
		Death.PSRAPower:

			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 5
			Stop	
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait

		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

// Medium size
Actor SamsaraMonsterDemonicMedium
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:		
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:

		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:

		Death.RTCWFire:

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.RottExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait

			TNT1 A 5
			Stop	
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)

			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")

			wait

			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")

			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

// Large size
Actor SamsaraMonsterDemonicLarge
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1

	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:		
		Death.RottFire:

			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 5
			Stop

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"DukeGibStart")

			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)

			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")

			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

{

    +NOICEDEATH

// Marathon ReMixer enemies, the Strife Entity, etc.

			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)

			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)

		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:

		Death.PainkillerShuriken:

			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait

		Death.UnrealSludge:

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

// Small size

{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5

			Loop

		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

// Medium size

{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5

			Loop

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

// Large size

{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5

			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

// Mechanical enemies //
// Arachnotrons, some Blake Stone ReMixer enemies, etc.

// Tiny size
Actor SamsaraMonsterMechanicalTiny
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5

	PainChance "CalebFire", 0

// Small size
Actor SamsaraMonsterMechanicalSmall
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	DamageFactor "ElectricBolt", 2.0
	DamageFactor "PoisonBolt", 0.5
	DamageFactor "MarathonFusion", 2.0
	DamageFactor "Tesla", 2.0
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 1.2
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 1.2
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:	
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.RottExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
	    XDeath321:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RottGibbedCreature",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 1
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LudicrousGibsItem", 1)
			TNT1 AA 0
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID", 0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking

			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOORCLIP",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("RGodModeDeathSmall")
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)

// Medium size
Actor SamsaraMonsterMechanicalMedium
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	DamageFactor "ElectricBolt", 2.0
	DamageFactor "PoisonBolt", 0.5
	DamageFactor "MarathonFusion", 2.0
	DamageFactor "Tesla", 2.0
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 1.2
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 1.2
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:	
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
	    XDeath321:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RottGibbedCreature",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 1
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LudicrousGibsItem", 1)
			TNT1 AA 0
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID", 0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking	
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOORCLIP",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("RGodModeDeathSmall")

// Large size
Actor SamsaraMonsterMechanicalLarge
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	DamageFactor "ElectricBolt", 2.0
	DamageFactor "PoisonBolt", 0.5
	DamageFactor "MarathonFusion", 2.0
	DamageFactor "Tesla", 2.0
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 1.2
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 1.2
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.RottExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
	    XDeath321:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RottGibbedCreature",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 1
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LudicrousGibsItem", 1)
			TNT1 AA 0
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking

// Huge size (reserve these for bosses)
Actor SamsaraMonsterMechanicalHuge
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.15
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
	DamageFactor "ElectricBolt", 2.0
	DamageFactor "PoisonBolt", 0.5
	DamageFactor "MarathonFusion", 2.0
	DamageFactor "Tesla", 2.0
	DamageFactor "CorvusHellstaffTomed", 0.2
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 1.2
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 1.2
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 0
	PainChance "PhosFireCoop", 0 	
	PainChance "EradCoopGreenFire", 0
	PainChance "EradGreenFire", 0
	PainChance "StrifeExplosive", 0
	PainChance "PSFire", 5	
	PainChance "WTMelee", 96
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 96	
	PainChance "ShrinkerDMG", 0	
	PainChance "PainkillerIce", 0
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	+DONTRIP
    +BOSSDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID", 0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking	
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOORCLIP",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("RGodModeDeathHuge")

// Beast enemies //
// Most of the Raven monsters, Exhumed ReMixer enemies, etc.

// Tiny size

			TNT1 A 5
			Stop	
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)

			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")

			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

// Small size
Actor SamsaraMonsterBeastSmall
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:	
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait

			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait

			wait

			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)

			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")

			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop

			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

// Medium size
Actor SamsaraMonsterBeastMedium
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:	
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:

		Death.RTCWFire:

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait

			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait

			Loop

			Stop

			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

// Large size
Actor SamsaraMonsterBeastLarge
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5

	PainChance "WTMelee", 255

    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:

			Stop	
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)

		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait

		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")

			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")

			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
	}
}

{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.15

    +NOICEDEATH

	{

{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1

	DamageFactor "DeusExRifleShot", 0.5

	DamageFactor "DeusExSabot", 1.2
	DamageFactor "DeusExSabotPistol", 1.2

	DamageFactor "DeusExBurned", 0.5
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255

		Death.TotenkopfFire:
		Death.RottFire:	
		Death.HexGreenFire:

			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze2",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait

		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait		
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
	}

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze2",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait		
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
	}

			Loop

			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait

		DeusXDeath:

			Wait

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze2",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")

			Wait

			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoGravity
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTGIB",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySoundEx("chex/zorch","soundslot5",0,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("ZorchEffectHuge")
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Gravity
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait		
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait		
	}

	+NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH

	{

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

		DeusXDeath:

			Wait

{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1

	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0

	+NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH

			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Gravity
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop
		ZorchFlyingDeath:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoGravity
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTGIB",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySoundEx("chex/zorch","soundslot5",0,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("ZorchEffectSmall")
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Gravity
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze2",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerFire:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait
