			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
	}

// Huge size (reserve these for bosses)
Actor SamsaraMonsterFlemoidHuge
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.15
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
	DamageFactor "Flem", 0.0
    DamageFactor "Slime", 0.0
	DamageFactor "CorvusHellstaffTomed", 0.2
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 0
	PainChance "PhosFireCoop", 0 	
	PainChance "EradCoopGreenFire", 0
	PainChance "EradGreenFire", 0
	PainChance "StrifeExplosive", 0
	PainChance "PSFire", 5	
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 96
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 96
	PainChance "ShrinkerDMG", 0
	PainChance "PainkillerIce", 0
    +DONTGIB
	+NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States

// Reserved for large ROTT humanoids, such as General John Darian
Actor SamsaraMonsterROTTHumanoidLarge
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.15
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "CorvusHellstaffTomed", 0.2
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 0
	PainChance "PhosFireCoop", 0 	
	PainChance "EradCoopGreenFire", 0
	PainChance "EradGreenFire", 0
	PainChance "StrifeExplosive", 0
	PainChance "PSFire", 5	
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 96
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 96
	PainChance "ShrinkerDMG", 0
	PainChance "PainkillerIce", 0
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID", 0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking	
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOORCLIP",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("RGodModeDeathBig")
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)

// Marathon aliens have unique XDeath states that require
// a special monster base; make sure to copy over the second
// and third XDeath states for each character with needed changes
Actor SamsaraMonsterMarathonAlienSmall
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:	
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.RottExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait

		XDeath321:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
			TNT1 A 0 A_Recoil(10)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath321_2")
			wait
		XDeath321_2:
			M_H3 I 6
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath321_3")
			wait
		XDeath321_3:
			M_H3 IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII 2 A_JumpIf(momx < 0.8 && momy < 0.8 && momz == 0, "XDeath321_4")
			M_H3 I 2 A_CheckFloor("XDeath321_4")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath321_3")
			wait
		XDeath321_4:
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)

			wait

			M_H3 IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII 2 A_JumpIf(momx < 0.8 && momy < 0.8 && momz == 0, "PainkillerGib4")
			M_H3 I 2 A_CheckFloor("PainkillerGib4")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"PainkillerGib3")
			wait
		PainkillerGib4:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath2")
			wait	
			
		Death.UnrealDamage:
		Death.UnrealPlasma:
		Death.UnrealSludge:
		Death.ASMDShockTrace:
		Death.UnrealExplosive:
		Death.UnrealRazor:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-20, "UnrealXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
			
		Death.UnrealExtreme:
		Death.UnrealRedeemer:
		Death.UnrealShredded:
		UnrealXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
			TNT1 A 0 A_Recoil(5)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"UnrealXDeath2")
			wait
		UnrealXDeath2:
			M_H3 I 6
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"UnrealXDeath3")
			wait
		UnrealXDeath3:
			M_H3 IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII 2 A_JumpIf(momx < 0.8 && momy < 0.8 && momz == 0, "UnrealXDeath4")
			M_H3 I 2 A_CheckFloor("UnrealXDeath4")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"UnrealXDeath3")
			wait
		UnrealXDeath4:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("UnrealGenericGibSpawnerM", 0,0,0,0,0,0,0, SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION | SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR| SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop	
			
		Death.RTCWExplosive:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")
			Goto RTCWXDeath
		Death.RTCWVenomBullet:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RTCW_DeathGibber",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|SXF_SETMASTER)
			//"####" "#" 5
			//"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RTCW_DeathGibberKeep",1,1)
			//Goto Death
			//"####" "#" 5
			//Goto Death		
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
			
		RTCWXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
			TNT1 A 0 A_Recoil(5)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"RTCWXDeath2")
			wait
		RTCWXDeath2:
			M_H3 I 6
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"RTCWXDeath3")
			wait
		RTCWXDeath3:
			M_H3 IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII 2 A_JumpIf(momx < 0.8 && momy < 0.8 && momz == 0, "RTCWXDeath4")
			M_H3 I 2 A_CheckFloor("RTCWXDeath4")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"RTCWXDeath3")
			wait
		RTCWXDeath4:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetSolid
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RTCW_GibSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop	
			
			
		Death.Q3Explosive:
		Death.Q3Energy:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-20,"XDeath.Q3Explosive")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		
		Death.Q3BFG:
		XDeath.Q3Explosive:
		XDeath.Q3Energy:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
			TNT1 A 0 A_Recoil(5)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeathForSarge2")
			wait
		XDeathForSarge2:
			M_H3 I 6
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeathForSarge3")
			wait
		XDeathForSarge3:
			M_H3 IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII 2 A_JumpIf(momx < 0.8 && momy < 0.8 && momz == 0, "XDeathForSarge4")
			M_H3 I 2 A_CheckFloor("XDeathForSarge4")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeathForSarge3")
			wait
		XDeathForSarge4:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItemEx("Q3GibGenerator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop
			
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")

			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait		
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait
			
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_FaceTarget
			TNT1 A 0 A_Recoil(5)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream

			wait
		DeusXDeath2:
			M_H3 I 6
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"DeusXDeath3")
			wait
		DeusXDeath3:
			M_H3 IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII 2 A_JumpIf(momx < 0.8 && momy < 0.8 && momz == 0, "DeusXDeath4")
			M_H3 I 2 A_CheckFloor("DeusXDeath4")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"DeusXDeath3")
			wait
		DeusXDeath4:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "XDeath2")
			Wait
	}

			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySoundEx("chex/zorch","soundslot5",0,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("ZorchEffectBig")
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Gravity
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop
		ZorchFlyingDeath:
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Samsara_KillCount", 0, 0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoGravity
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTGIB",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySoundEx("chex/zorch","soundslot5",0,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("ZorchEffectBig")
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Gravity
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze2",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
	}
}

// Some of the Half Life bosses have special death states
// that require a unique base to work with
Actor SamsaraMonsterHLAlienHuge
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.15
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
	DamageFactor "CorvusHellstaffTomed", 0.2
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 0
	PainChance "PhosFireCoop", 0 	
	PainChance "EradCoopGreenFire", 0
	PainChance "EradGreenFire", 0
	PainChance "StrifeExplosive", 0
	PainChance "PSFire", 5	
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 96
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 96
	PainChance "ShrinkerDMG", 0	
	PainChance "PainkillerIce", 0
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	States
	{
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stopsound(CHAN_WEAPON)
			"####" "#" 0 A_RemoveChildren(TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SOLID", 0)

}

// Miscellaneous character bases
// The misc. characters are split into 4 types of either interactive (dynamic)
// or non-interactive (static) characters, for a total of 8 bases

// Humanoid misc. characters
// Duke3D strippers, Blood innocents, etc.
Actor SamsaraMiscCharHumanoidStatic
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)

			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:

			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))

		Death.PainkillerElectro:

		Death.PainkillerShuriken:

			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop		
	}
}

			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"XDeath")
			wait		
		Death.UnrealDamage:
		Death.UnrealPlasma:
		Death.UnrealSludge:
		Death.ASMDShockTrace:
		Death.UnrealExplosive:
		Death.UnrealRazor:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-20, "UnrealXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.UnrealExtreme:
		Death.UnrealRedeemer:
		Death.UnrealShredded:
		UnrealXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("UnrealGenericGibSpawnerM", 0,0,0,0,0,0,0, SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION | SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR| SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 0 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnSetSolid
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop			
		Death.RTCWExplosive:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")
			Goto RTCWXDeath
		Death.RTCWVenomBullet:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"RTCWXDeath")

			//"####" "#" 5
			//"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RTCW_DeathGibberKeep",1,1)
			//Goto Death
			//"####" "#" 5
			//Goto Death		
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		RTCWXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_UnsetSolid
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RTCW_GibSpawner",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR|SXF_SETMASTER)
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop	
		Death.Q3Explosive:
		Death.Q3Energy:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-20,"XDeath.Q3Explosive")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 5 A_FadeOut
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait		
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "XDeath")
			Wait
	}
}

// Animal misc. characters
// Redneck Rampage animals, etc.
Actor SamsaraMiscCharAnimalStatic
{
    DamageFactor "CorvusCrossbow", 1.1
    DamageFactor "DragonClaw", 1.5
    DamageFactor "WitchMelee", 1.1	
	PainChance "MightyBoot", 255
	PainChance "CalebFire", 0
	PainChance "WTMelee", 255
	PainChance "WTMeleeIce", 255	   
    +NOTDMATCH
    +NOICEDEATH
	-COUNTKILL
	States
	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:		
		Death.RottFire:
		Death.WolfenFlamethrower:
		Death.HexGreenFire:
		Death.PGFire:
		Death.MarathonPlasmaFire:
		Death.QuakeFire:
		Death.FireExplosive:
		Death.PhosFire:	
		Death.PhosFireCoop:
		Death.WTRangedFire:
		Death.RTCWFire:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFire:
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.DoomDamageTypeFireExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128,2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-100,"XDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.RottExplosive:
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-3,"XDeath321")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
	    XDeath321:
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RottGibbedCreature",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 1
			TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_GiveToTarget("LudicrousGibsItem", 1)
			TNT1 AA 0
			TNT1 A 5 A_NoBlocking
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			Stop
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			TNT1 A 0 A_ChangeFlag(SOLID,0)

			TNT1 A 1 A_SpawnItem("RGodModeDeath")

			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop
		Disintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTGIB",1)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)

			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("FLOORCLIP",TRUE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("DisintEffectSmall",0,10)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait		
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "XDeath")
			Wait
	}
}

	{
		Death.TotenkopfFire:

			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait	
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.Painkiller:
		Death.PainkillerBullet:
		Death.PainkillerElectro:
		Death.PainkillerExplosive:
		Death.PainkillerShuriken:
		Death.PainkillerDemon:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Death")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"Burn")
			wait
		Death.PainkillerStake:
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("Painkiller_RunStake",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_StakeShatter",1)==0,"Death.Painkiller")
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_MonsterKill")
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_IsItGibbed")==1,"PainkillerGib")
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_FaceTarget
			"####" "#" -1 A_Jump(256,"StakeDeath")
			Wait
		StakeDeath:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerGib:
			TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Gib",CHAN_BODY)
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("Painkiller_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 350	// Needed for souls to appear when gibbed
			Stop
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Burn")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-40, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("DeusEx_GibCreator")
			TNT1 A 0 A_Fall
			TNT1 A 0 A_Scream
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("UniversalBloodyHellGoreXDeathEffect",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_NOCHECKPOSITION|SXF_USEBLOODCOLOR)
			TNT1 A 6 A_FadeOut
			Stop		
	}
}

			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze2",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait

			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")

			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Gravity
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop
		ZorchFlyingDeath:
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoGravity
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTGIB",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySoundEx("chex/zorch","soundslot5",0,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("ZorchEffectSmall")
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("EnemyZorched",1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Scream
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			TNT1 A 1 A_SetTranslucent(1,0)
			TNT1 A 0 A_Gravity
			TNT1 A 2 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("SamsaraBossDeathToggler")
			stop
		Pain.PainkillerIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,1)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,2)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_JumpIf(CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",1,3)==1,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",false)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",true)
			"####" "#" 0 A_StopSound(CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Freeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("Painkiller_Freeze2",0,1)
		PainkillerIceLoop:
			"####" "#" 2
			Loop
		PainkillerIceThaw:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("Painkiller/Freezer/Unfreeze",CHAN_BODY)
			"####" "#" 20
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,1))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOGRAVITY",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,2))
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOBLOOD",CallACS("Painkiller_FlagStorage",2,3))
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256,"See")
			wait
		Death.DeusExMelee:
		Death.DeusExStunned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExLAM:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 0)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait				
		Death.DeusExPistol:
		Death.DeusExKnockedOut:
		Death.DeusExPoisonEffect:
		Death.DeusExPistolFire:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabotPistol:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 1)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExSabot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait			
		Death.DeusExRifleShot:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
		Death.DeusExRifleExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 2)
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "DeusXDeath")
			Wait					
		Death.DeusExFlamed:
		Death.DeusExBurned:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
			TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50, "DeusXDeath")
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait		
		Death.DeusExExploded:
			TNT1 A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("DeusEx_KillScript", 0, 0, 3)
		DeusXDeath:
			TNT1 A 0
			TNT1 A -1 A_Jump(256, "Death")
			Wait	
	}
}

// Corpse bases
// The corpses are the easiest bases to cover, with only 3
// types to choose from
Actor SamsaraCorpseActorSmall
{
	-SHOOTABLE
	+VULNERABLE
	+ISMONSTER
	-COUNTKILL
	-SOLID
	+NOTARGET
	-FRIENDLY
	+NEVERTARGET
	+SEESDAGGERS
	States
	{
		Death.RottDisintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_RemoveMaster
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("RGodModeDeathTiny")
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			stop
		Disintegrate:
			"####" "#" 0 A_RemoveMaster
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 3 A_SpawnItem("DisintEffectTiny",0,10)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.9,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.8,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.7,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.6,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 3 A_SetTranslucent(0.5,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.4,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.3,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.2,0)
			"####" "#" 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("ExtraDeathFX",0,1)
			"####" "#" 2 A_SetTranslucent(0.1,0)
			stop
		Death.Nuke:
			"####" "#" 0 A_RemoveMaster
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("SHOOTABLE",FALSE)
			"####" "#" 0 A_SpawnItem("WTNukeDeathSmall")
			"####" "#################" 3 A_Fadeout(0.05)
			stop
		Death.DukeIce:
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySound("duke/enemyfreeze")
			"####" "#" 0 A_GiveInventory("FreezethrowerWeakness")
		Ice:
		Death.HexenIce:
		Death.WTMeleeIce:
		Death.WTRangedIce:
		Death.DoomDamageTypeIce:
		Death.Ice:
			"####" "#" 0 A_RemoveMaster
			"####" "#" 0 A_NoBlocking
			"####" "#" 0 A_GenericFreezeDeath
			"####" "#" 70 A_UnsetSolid
			"####" "#" 0 A_IceGuyDie
			"####" "#" 1 A_IceGuyDie
			TNT1 A 0
			stop
		Death.ZorchPistol:
		Death.Zorch:
		Death.ZorchKamikaze:
		Death.PhasingZorch:
		Death.ZorchSpectral:
			"####" "#" 0 A_Stop
			"####" "#" 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTGIB",1)
			"####" "#" 0 A_PlaySoundEx("chex/zorch","soundslot5",0,0)

Actor Samsara_BossDeath : Trigger
{
	States
	{
		Pickup:
			TNT1 A 0 A_BossDeath
			Stop
	}
}

Actor Samsara_KillMaster : Trigger
{
	States
	{
		Pickup:
			TNT1 A 0 A_KillMaster
			Stop
	}
}

// The following enemies will need to have their states manually
// placed in due to how they might function or require them to
// be based off their original actors; if the monster bases are
// updated, make sure that the needed states are either updated
// or correctly copied over

//-----------------------
// Reincarnation Enemies:
//-----------------------

// Doom
// Pain Elemental - SamsaraMonsterDemonicLarge

// Heretic
// Imp - SamsaraMonsterBeastSmall
// Wizard - SamsaraMonsterDemonicMediumTotalGib
// Undead Warrior - SamsaraMonsterDemonicMediumTotalGib
// Ironlich - SamsaraMonsterRoboticLarge
// Minotaur - SamsaraMonsterBeastHuge
// D'sparil - SamsaraMonsterDemonicHuge

// Hexen
// Afrit - SamsaraMonsterBeastSmall
// Bishop - SamsaraMonsterSkeletonMedium
// Death Wyvern - SamsaraMonsterBeastHuge
// Wendigo - SamsaraMonsterSkeletonMedium
// Wraith - SamsaraMonsterDemonicSmall
// Stalker - SamsaraMonsterBeastSmall
// Zedek - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium
// Traductus - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium
// Menelkir - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium
// Heresiarch - SamsaraMonsterDemonicHuge
// Korax - SamsaraMonsterDemonicHuge

// Strife
// Acolyte - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium
// Acolyte (Blue) - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium
// Beggar - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium
// Peasant - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium
// Macil - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMediumTotalGib
// Crusader - SamsaraMonsterRoboticLarge
// Sentinal - SamsaraMonsterRoboticMedium
// Stalker - SamsaraMonsterRoboticSmall
// Ceiling Turret - SamsaraMonsterRoboticSmall
// Reaver - SamsaraMonsterRoboticMedium
// Inquisitor - SamsaraMonsterRoboticLarge
// Templar - SamsaraMonsterRoboticMedium
// Bishop - SamsaraMonsterRoboticHuge
// Programmer - SamsaraMonsterRoboticHuge
// Loremaster - SamsaraMonsterRoboticHuge
// Spectres - SamsaraMonsterSkeletonHuge

// Hacx
// Android - SamsaraMonsterRoboticMedium

// Other
// AnubisWarriorReinc - SamsaraMonsterHumanoidMedium
// StrifePeasant - SamsaraMiscCharHumanoidStatic

//-----------------
// ReMixer Enemies:
//-----------------

// Doom
// Pain Elemental - SamsaraMonsterDemonicLarge

// Doom 64
// Pain Elemental - SamsaraMonsterDemonicLarge

// Heretic
// D'sparil - SamsaraMonsterDemonicHuge
